description:
Company Description

L&M Office Furniture provides workspace solutions, such as furniture, lighting, digital technology, design, and installation. L&M is well known for affordable prices, quick delivery, dependable service, and reliable warranties. L&M has an experienced team consisting of a seasoned account executives, talented interior designers, and a highly qualified installation team. At L&M, customers are valued relationships, and we take pride in strong relationships and strive to continue building new ones.

Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role for a VP of Sales. The VP of Sales will be responsible for managing a team of salespeople, meeting sales targets and goals, developing and implementing sales strategies, managing customer accounts, and maintaining relationships with customers. Communication with leadership.

Qualifications
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
• Proven experience in sales, preferably in the furniture or related industry
• Ability to lead and motivate a team of salespeople a natural leader preferable
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
• Knowledge of CRM software and sales performance metrics
• Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or similar field or equivilent experience.
• Strong negotiation skills
• Ability to travel for business purposes, if needed
• Auto allowance provided
